attributes.action: Free the growth of Hemp from license
attributes.additional_details:
This plant can also produce a bio-fuel that could replace current fossils fuels, paper, clothing, building materials, it can even clean chemical rich land!, the list goes on.

The potential for job creation within the Hemp industry would be in it's 1000's, from growers to refiners and regulators.

This plant has the potential of saving our Economy and the our Planet!!

Please sign and share :)
attributes.background:
This petition is to free the plant Hemp from license, this would allow the complete freedom of any person to grow, control and study the Hemp plant.
This plant has the potential of giving our society a new lease of life by creating sustainable energy resource for our power stations.
